Events

ACHS IT Club aims to inculcate and spread technical knowledge through a medium of guest lectures, research and workshops.

ACHS Mini Hack

Dec 14, 2019

Participants created a bot for "MATCH GAME" (tile matching game) using python and Microsoft AI services. At the end of the event, all the bot so developed by the participants will compete with each other making a tournament.
